name: LogisticsActivity
description: Superclass: LogisticsActivity is a scheduled set of tasks that is executed as part of one or more Services

columns.name: checkActions
columns.description: References to CheckActions performed for the Activity

columns.name: contactPersons
columns.description: References to Actors (Person; NonHumanActor) acting as contacts

columns.name: executionStatus
columns.description: Enum stating the status of the Activity

columns.name: servedServices
columns.description: Reference to Services this Activity is executed for

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
